name: Vanguard International High Dividend Yield ETF
description: The Vanguard International High Dividend Yield ETF (VYMI) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to provide investors with exposure to high dividend yield stocks outside of the United States. Launched in 2016, VYMI aims to track the performance of the FTSE All-World ex US High Dividend Yield Index, which includes companies from developed and emerging markets that are characterized by high dividend yields. This ETF is designed for investors looking for income through dividends, as well as potential long-term capital appreciation. VYMI holds a diversified portfolio of international equities across various sectors, including financials, consumer goods, and energy, allowing for a balanced approach to investing in global markets. The fund is managed by Vanguard, a company known for its commitment to low-cost investing and investor-centric philosophy. With competitive expense ratios, VYMI provides a cost-effective way for investors to gain exposure to high-yield international stocks while also benefiting from Vanguard's extensive research and risk management practices.

products: Vanguard International High Dividend Yield ETF (VYMI)
